title: University of Memphis | DraftExpress and Givony Basketball contract requests

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: University of Memphis | DraftExpress and Givony Basketball contract requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any contractual agreements, with dollar amount(s), between the University of Memphis | University of Memphis Athletics Department and the following entities from 2018 to the date this request is processed:

DRAFTEXPRESS SPORTS APTITUDE, which may be noted as DRAFTEXPRESS SPORTS APTITUDE LLC

DRAFTEXPRESS, which may be noted as DRAFTEXPRESS LLC

DX SCOUTING SERVICES, which may be noted as DX SCOUTING SERVICES LLC

DRAFT EXPRESS BLUE which may be noted as DX BLUE

Givony Basketball Associates

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

If there are fees, we would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. We also ask that our request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available (email: holler@bwd.nyc and burtpainter@gmail.com) – if not, secure file transfer, thumb drive, or CD-ROM. We are also available via phone at 718.360.6359 to discuss any questions you have about the request.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Bradford William Davis and Robert Silverman.
